3ala rasi
Machine learning huwa far3 min el intelligence elli 7assalit 3ala el computer biyeshteghil bi tasks bla ma ykun mu3ayyan bi-tareeq wadi7.
Fil machine learning, el algorithms bi3refon yishteghilu 3a data, bi3rifon minna, w bi-khodu qarar aw ta3leem bas 3ala el analysis.
Image captioning huwa el process li b talli3 description textual 3an el mawdu3at elli f el sura.
Fil image captioning, model bit3allam yifham el mawdu3 el visual bi-sura w ytalli3 description bil-lugha natural 3anha.

patterns: Shu el tools el mosta3malin fi machine learning?
responses: Some popular machine learning tools include TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, w Keras.
Fi machine learning, mumkin testa3mul tools metel Jupyter Notebook, Pandas, NumPy, w Matplotlib lal-analysis w el visualization el data.

patterns: Shu el tools el musta3malin fi image captioning?
responses: Common tools l-image captioning shamil TensorFlow's Object Detection API, PyTorch's torchvision library, w OpenCV lal-image processing.
Lal-image captioning tasks, mumkin testa3mul pretrained models metel Show and Tell, Transformer-based architectures metel BERT, w neural networks custom trained 3ala datasets image-caption.
Transfer learning huwa technique machine learning 3andaha model 3am bi3awed 3ala task wa7ad w bitabi2 start point 3ala model 3ala task tene.
Fil transfer learning, el 3elm elli bi2rab min el hall el problem wahid bitishteghil 3ala el problem el tene related, bil-3adet bil-7araq w el wa2t fil-tareef.
